extractors.balanceGreaterThan: (params) => { const amount = parseFloat(balance.replace(/[$,]/g, '')); return amount > params.amount; }
extractors.hasMinimumBalance: (params) => { const amount = parseFloat(balance.replace(/[$,]/g, '')); return amount >= params.minimum; }
extractors.hasRecentActivity: () => { const lastDate = new Date(lastActivity); const daysSince = (Date.now() - lastDate.getTime()) / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24); return daysSince < 30; }

supportedClaims.name: balanceGreaterThan
supportedClaims.description: Proves account balance is greater than specified amount

supportedClaims.name: hasMinimumBalance
supportedClaims.description: Proves account has minimum required balance

supportedClaims.name: isCheckingAccount
supportedClaims.description: Proves account is a checking account

supportedClaims.name: isSavingsAccount
supportedClaims.description: Proves account is a savings account

supportedClaims.name: hasRecentActivity
supportedClaims.description: Proves account has activity within last 30 days
